name: mouse-halo
title: Mouse Halo
description: Adds a halo around your mouse pointer. Useful for screensharing and presentations.
author: justinheinze

preferences.name: backgroundColor
preferences.title: Background Color
preferences.description: Background color in hex format (e.g., #FF0000). Updates require toggle to take effect.

preferences.name: borderColor
preferences.title: Border Color
preferences.description: Border color in hex format (e.g., #FF0000). Updates require toggle to take effect.

preferences.name: backgroundOpacity
preferences.title: Background Opacity
preferences.description: Background opacity (0.0 to 1.0). Updates require toggle to take effect.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
